p: Considering the folkloric significance of B. disticha around the Hogback community in the Eastern Cape Province of South Africa, it is essential to scientifically validate the biological activities of B. disticha with in vitro studies. As a result, this present study aimed to investigate the bioactive compounds, antioxidant and antiproliferative activities of bulb solvent extracts (chloroform, acetone, and ethanol) of B. disticha.
